title: 关于BS-SingleUse重叠使用
author: QAQexe
txt_content: 如题,问问大佬如何使用BS-SingleUse实现一个位置不同权限看到不同的图标？如果可以,请大佬们把例子发帖子下面谢谢。

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
QAQexe 发表于 2018-9-11 13:33
关于权限的分配呢- -
xxx.xxx.xxx你改成你想要的权限

replies.author: QAQexe
replies.txt_content:
PY狗 发表于 2018-9-10 20:27
BossShopPro才可以
那请问BSP的例子= =我过几天买一个BSP可以的吧

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
BSP就是添加条件。装一个LimitedUses [BSP]https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/limiteduses-bsp-allows-to-limit-the-amount-of-uses-of-shop-items.26275/就是多两个条件
https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/bossshoppro-conditions/这里是条件教程

replies.author: QAQexe
replies.txt_content:
PY狗 发表于 2018-9-11 13:01
BSP就是添加条件。装一个LimitedUses https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/limiteduses-bsp-allows- ...
看不懂怎么说- -你干脆写一个例子吧 我看不懂外国的语言 hhh

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
大概是这样子
ShopName: 例子商店
DisplayName: '&9&l例子商店'
Command: 例子商店
signs:
  text: '[例子商店]'
  NeedPermissionToCreateSign: true
shop:
  钻石:
    MenuItem:
    - '%rewarditem_1%'
    - lore:&c价格 %price%.#&8点击买5颗钻石.
    - name:&2&l钻石
    RewardType: ITEM
    Reward:
    - - type:DIAMOND
      - amount:5
    PriceType: MONEY
    Price: 200.0
    Message: '&c你花费&2%price%&c购买了&2%reward%  .'
    ExtraPermission: ''
    InventoryLocation: 5
    Condition:
    - type:Permission
    - match:xxx.xxx.xxx
  钻石无权限:
    MenuItem:
    - name:&4&l没有权限
    - type:BARRIER
    RewardType: NOTHING
    PriceType: NOTHING
    Message: '&c没有权限!'
    ExtraPermission: ''
    InventoryLocation: 5复制代码
